title: r/AmITheA**hole Entitled kids stole from my garden, so I planted a cactus trap!
description:
r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP has an ongoing confrontation with his entitled neighbors. The neighbor kids keep coming into her yard to steal things from his garden. He wants to know if he will be a jerk for planting thorny plants and cacti all over his garden to keep the neighbor kids out. But, it turns out he doesn't need to go that far! He catches the family stealing fruit from his garden red-handed and calls the cops on them! The cops show up while they are IN THE PROCESS OF STEALING and OP gets his revenge! If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
